title: Wedding Invite Font Identification
content:
[http://shannoneileenblog.typepad.com/.a/6a0120a5c8d9a9970c0133f096a0bb97...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012150120/http:/shannoneileenblog.typepad.com/.a/6a0120a5c8d9a9970c0133f096a0bb970b-pi "http://shannoneileenblog.typepad.com/.a/6a0120a5c8d9a9970c0133f096a0bb970b-pi")

Knowing even one of these would be helpful. Especially the Jill and Matt fonts. Thanks!
author: kstarnes

comments.content: Jill looks like Bodoni, Matt like Futura Condensed Extra Black Italic.
